item.description:
Hi everyone

I know it's last minute, but It's Complicated is playing at The Strand Theater in Clinton this Sunday (Feb 21) and wondered if anyone wanted to join me. The movie starts at 7:00 p.m. There is plenty of on-street parking (no meters on Sunday after 5:00 I believe), admission I think is $5.50

Here's the link again for the movie theater ... http://www.strandthea... ... as you go into the Theater, there's an outside lobby we can meet at. I'll be there sporting a green zip-up LL Bean ski jacket.

Look forward to seeing you there.

Peg
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sporting a green ski jacket, and i'll be in the lobby as you buy tickets

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: It's Complicated - Movie at the Strand Theater
